text.div:
This case-sensitive code system https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/CodeSystem/dsm5-q4 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
1 I do not talk more than usual.
2 I occasionally talk more than usual.
3 I often talk more than usual
4 I frequently talk more than usual
5 I talk constantly and cannot be interrupted.

name: DSM5Q4
title: dsm5 q4
description: The codes required for dsm5 q4 questionnaire

concept.display: I do not talk more than usual.
I occasionally talk more than usual.
I often talk more than usual
I frequently talk more than usual
I talk constantly and cannot be interrupted.
